channel.title: Packet Lost Type?

item.title: Packet Lost Type?
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

Well this is sort of a client side error, But i think it has something to do with my server.
The client im using is Bluurrs client, and the server is a Devo source.

This is basically what happens, Its the start to a quest im making.

It disconnects when the NPC dialogue is supposed to come up.
This is basically the code for it all

public void UpdateNPCChat() {
		/*sendFrame126("", 4902);
		sendFrame126("", 4903);
		sendFrame126("", 4904);
		sendFrame126("", 4905);
		sendFrame126("", 4906);*/
		sendFrame126("", 976);
		switch (NpcDialogue) {
			case 1:
				playertalk("Give me a quest!", 614);
				break;
			case 2:
				talk("Give me a quest what? ", 706);
				break;
			case 3:
				choice3("Give me a quest plase.","Give me a quest or else!", "Just stop messing around and give me a quest!");
				break;
			case 4:
				playertalk("Give me a quest plase.", 614);
				break;
			case 5:
				talk2("Well seeing as you asked nicley... I could do with some", "help.", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 6:
				talk2("The wizard Grayzag next door decided he didin't like", "me so he enlisted an army of hundreds of imps.", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 7:
				talk3("These imps stole all shorts of my things. Most of these", "things I don't really care about, just eggs and balls of.", "sring and things.", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 8:
				talk2("But they stole my four magical beads. There was a red", "one, a yellow one, a black one, and a white one.", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 9:
				talk2("These imps have now spread out all over the knigdom.", "Could you Get my beads back for me?", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 10:
				choice("I'll try.","I've better things to do that chase imps.");
				break;
			case 11:
				playertalk("I'll try.", 614);
				break;
			case 12:
				talk("That's great, thank you.", 706);
				q8 = 1;
				sendQuest("@yel@Imp Catcher", 7340);
				break;
			case 13:
				playertalk("Just stop messing around and give me a quest!", 614);
				break;
			case 14:
				talk("Ah now you're assuming I have one to give.", 706);
				break;
			case 15:
				playertalk("I've better things to do that chase imps.", 614);
				break;
			case 16:
				talk2("Well if you're not interested in the quests I have to","give you, don't waste my time by asking me for them.", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 17:
				playertalk("Give me a quest or else!", 614);
				break;
			case 18:
				talk("Or else what? You'll attack me? ", 706);
				break;
			case 19:
				talk("Hahaha!", 706);
				break;
			case 20:
				playertalk("I've better things to do that chase imps.", 614);
				break;
			case 21:
				talk2("Well if you're not interested in the quests I have to","give you, don't waste my time by asking me for them.", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 22:
				talk2("Well if you're not interested in the quests I have to","give you, don't waste my time by asking me for them.", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 23:
				playertalk("I've got all four beads. It was hard work I can tell you.", 614);
				break;
			case 24:
				talk3("Give them here and I'll check that they really are MY", "beads, before I give your reward. You'll like it it's", "an amulet of accuracy.", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 25:
				playertalk("I have found some of your beads.", 614);
				break;
			case 26:
				talk3("Come back when you have them all. The colour of the", "four beads that I need are red, yellow, black, and white.", "Go chase some imps!", 706, 614);
				break;
			case 27:
				playertalk("I've not found any yet.", 614);
				break;
			case 28:
				talk2("Well get on with it. I've lost a white bead, a red bead, a", "black bead, and a yellow bead. Go kill some imps!", 706, 614);
				break;


		}
	}

Now the error i get client side,

connected to update server
loading custom spirts part 1
loading custom spirts part 2
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection

Is the error client side or server side?
Im guessing its client side, if thats the case can somebody help me with that because i wouldnâ€™t have a clue where to start

Read full topic
